name: Not Another Zombie Shooter
description:
NOT ANOTHER ZOMBIE SHOOTER
GamePlay

(sorry for low FPS)


In a world dominated by zombies, only the strong survive, they will always be the first.

But those who are second ones, we must help those.

When you have a survivor, he can shoot with you, take weapons and defend your back until you take him to the shelter.

Controls:
WASD for move
Mouse for rotate aim
Right Click for Shoot
E for interactive
Q for Lock Survivor in shooting mode

Mission:
How score can you get by killing zombies and rescuing seconds ones (I will never call them first... because the first is our hero)
PD: yes.. the hero of this game is a bit cocky.. you will notice it when playing
